query.name: packageCode
query.description: Unique package identifier generated by EPIS. Used to communicate between EPIS and external systems

query.name: platformOrderCreationTime
query.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds. Default: Current timestamp when EPIS receives the request

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/epis/external/packages')
request.add_api_parameter("packageCode", "FU2520086700000000000123")
request.add_api_parameter("trackingNumber", "LMP017496699VNA")
request.add_api_parameter("packageType", "Sales_order")
request.add_api_parameter("externalOrderId", "FP123456")
request.add_api_parameter("lazadaOrderId", "LAZADA_FP123456")
request.add_api_parameter("platformOrderCreationTime", "1686804030948")
request.add_api_parameter("deliveryOption", "standard")
request.add_api_parameter("dangerousGood", "false")
request.add_api_parameter("items", "{\"unitPrice\":\"6688.99\",\"quantity\":\"3\",\"dimWeight\":{\"length\":\"11\",\"width\":\"13\",\"weight\":\"123.3\",\"height\":\"12\"},\"name\":\"NYX Professional Makeup Cant Stop Wont Stop Liquid Matte Foundation\",\"id\":\"123123123\",\"sku\":\"SKU_123\",\"category\":\"Electronics\",\"paidPrice\":\"0\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("partner", "{\"partnerName\":\"Haravan\",\"platformName\":\"Haravan\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("origin", "{\"address\":{\"details\":\"29A Lim tower 3\",\"id\":\"R80010624\",\"type\":\"home\"},\"phone\":\"85642981111\",\"geoLocation\":{\"latitude\":\"-6.123123\",\"longitude\":\"100.123123\"},\"name\":\"Wahana Express Rempoa\",\"email\":\"mail@domain.com\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("destination", "{\"address\":{\"details\":\"29A Lim tower 3\",\"id\":\"R80010624\",\"type\":\"home\"},\"phone\":\"85642981111\",\"geoLocation\":{\"latitude\":\"-6.123123\",\"longitude\":\"100.123123\"},\"name\":\"Wahana Express Rempoa\",\"email\":\"mail@domain.com\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("payment", "{\"totalAmount\":\"123.3\",\"insuranceAmount\":\"0\",\"currency\":\"IDR\",\"paymentType\":\"COD\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("dimWeight", "{\"length\":\"11\",\"width\":\"13\",\"weight\":\"123.3\",\"height\":\"12\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("options", "{\"directReturnToMerchant\":\"false\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("rawPayload", "{}")
request.add_api_parameter("lexMsgType", "packageInfoUpdate")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/epis/external/packages')
request.add_api_param('packageCode', 'FU2520086700000000000123')
request.add_api_param('trackingNumber', 'LMP017496699VNA')
request.add_api_param('packageType', 'Sales_order')
request.add_api_param('externalOrderId', 'FP123456')
request.add_api_param('lazadaOrderId', 'LAZADA_FP123456')
request.add_api_param('platformOrderCreationTime', '1686804030948')
request.add_api_param('deliveryOption', 'standard')
request.add_api_param('dangerousGood', 'false')
request.add_api_param('items', '{\"unitPrice\":\"6688.99\",\"quantity\":\"3\",\"dimWeight\":{\"length\":\"11\",\"width\":\"13\",\"weight\":\"123.3\",\"height\":\"12\"},\"name\":\"NYX Professional Makeup Cant Stop Wont Stop Liquid Matte Foundation\",\"id\":\"123123123\",\"sku\":\"SKU_123\",\"category\":\"Electronics\",\"paidPrice\":\"0\"}')
request.add_api_param('partner', '{\"partnerName\":\"Haravan\",\"platformName\":\"Haravan\"}')
request.add_api_param('origin', '{\"address\":{\"details\":\"29A Lim tower 3\",\"id\":\"R80010624\",\"type\":\"home\"},\"phone\":\"85642981111\",\"geoLocation\":{\"latitude\":\"-6.123123\",\"longitude\":\"100.123123\"},\"name\":\"Wahana Express Rempoa\",\"email\":\"mail@domain.com\"}')
request.add_api_param('destination', '{\"address\":{\"details\":\"29A Lim tower 3\",\"id\":\"R80010624\",\"type\":\"home\"},\"phone\":\"85642981111\",\"geoLocation\":{\"latitude\":\"-6.123123\",\"longitude\":\"100.123123\"},\"name\":\"Wahana Express Rempoa\",\"email\":\"mail@domain.com\"}')
request.add_api_param('payment', '{\"totalAmount\":\"123.3\",\"insuranceAmount\":\"0\",\"currency\":\"IDR\",\"paymentType\":\"COD\"}')
request.add_api_param('dimWeight', '{\"length\":\"11\",\"width\":\"13\",\"weight\":\"123.3\",\"height\":\"12\"}')
request.add_api_param('options', '{\"directReturnToMerchant\":\"false\"}')
request.add_api_param('rawPayload', '{}')
request.add_api_param('lexMsgType', 'packageInfoUpdate')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
